title: Obsession
description: Elliana Fields feels as if her loneliness is eating her from the inside out. She wants for nothing…except love. A deep, true love like the one her parents have. A love that makes each day spectacular.Her new bodyguard makes her young heart trip madly. Shy by nature, she’s unsure how to talk to the enigmatic Hyde without blushing, much less how to fulfill her wildly inappropriate crush. A devastating event shakes up her entire world and she learns a shocking secret that could destroy every chance of love with the man she dreams about day and night. Every so often, a woman has to take the reins and ride hell for leather.A contemporary romance by Always the Good Girl, Shayne McClendon.
author: Shayne McClendon
